name: TRIANGLE BUILDING CENTER and Kemper Insurance Company, Respondents, v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LINCH). Petition of Malcolm R. LINCH
name_abbreviation: Triangle Building Center v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: TRIANGLE BUILDING CENTER and Kemper Insurance Company, Respondents, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LINCH). Petition of Malcolm R. LINCH.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of November, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to the following issue:
Was Appellant working under concurrent contracts with two or more employers so that his wages from all such employers shall be considered as if earned from the employer liable for compensation under 77 P.S. § 582(e)?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gary D. Martz, York, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
721 A.2d 42
TRIANGLE BUILDING CENTER and Kemper Insurance Company, Respondents, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LINCH). Petition of Malcolm R. LINCH.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 30, 1998.
Gary D. Martz, York, for petitioner.
